chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Prop
X: Prop

Goal:
dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X <-> Y)

Premises:
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
impl_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X -> Y)
or_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X \/ Y)
and_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X /\ Y)
dec_DM_impl : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X -> Y) -> X /\ ~ Y
dec_DM_and : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X /\ Y) -> ~ X \/ ~ Y
Dec_reflect_eq : forall (X Y : Prop) (d : dec X) (e : dec Y), Dec X = Dec Y < -> (X <-> Y)
Dec_auto : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), X -> Dec X
Dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X
Dec_auto_not : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), ~ X -> ~ Dec X
not_dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec (~ X)
Dec_reflect : forall (X : Prop) (d : dec X), Dec X < -> X
dec_DN : forall X : Prop, dec X -> ~ ~ X -> X
dec_transfer : forall P Q : Prop, P < -> Q -> dec P -> dec Q
dec2bool : forall P : Prop, dec P -> bool
Dec_true' : forall (P : Prop) (d : dec P), P -> Dec P = true
Dec_true : forall (P : Prop) (H : dec P), Dec P = true -> P
Dec_false : forall (P : Prop) (H : dec P), Dec P = false -> ~ P
Dec_false' : forall (P : Prop) (d : dec P), ~ P -> Dec P = false
True_dec = left I : dec True
bool_dec : forall b : bool, dec b
False_dec = right (fun H : False => False_ind False H) : dec False
ZifyClasses.op_iff : forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> p2 < -> q2 -> ?Op p1 p2 < -> ?Op q1 q2 where ?Op : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Prop -> Prop -> Prop] ?PropOp : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- ZifyClasses.PropOp ?Op]
Tauto.eval_f_morph : forall (ex : ?TX -> Prop) (ev ev' : ?TA -> Prop) (f : Tauto.GFormula), (forall a : ?TA, ev a <-> ev' a) -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev f < -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev' f where ?TA : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?TX : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?AA : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?AF : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type]
ZifyClasses.uop_iff : forall p1 q1 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> ?Op p1 < -> ?Op q1 where ?Op : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Prop -> Prop] ?PropUOp : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- ZifyClasses.PropUOp ?Op]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?TX : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?AA : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type] ?AF : [X : Prop Y : Prop |- Type]
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
ZifyClasses.PropOp_iff = fun Op : Prop -> Prop -> Prop => forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> p2 < -> q2 -> Op p1 p2 < -> Op q1 q2 : (Prop -> Prop -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments ZifyClasses.PropOp_iff _%function_scope
ZifyClasses.impl_morph : forall s1 s2 t1 t2 : Prop, s1 < -> t1 -> s2 < -> t2 -> (s1 -> s2) < -> (t1 -> t2)
Ring_polynom.norm_subst : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> nat -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C) -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C
Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C)
ZifyClasses.mkprop : forall Op : Prop -> Prop -> Prop, (forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 <-> q1 -> p2 <-> q2 -> Op p1 p2 <-> Op q1 q2) -> ZifyClasses.PropOp Op
Decidable.not_not_iff : forall A : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> ((A -> False) -> False) < -> A
ZifyClasses.PropUOp_iff = fun Op : Prop -> Prop => forall p1 q1 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> Op p1 < -> Op q1 : (Prop -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments ZifyClasses.PropUOp_iff _%function_scope
OrderedRing.mk_SOR_theory : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid_Theory R req -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rtimes x1 y1) (rtimes x2 y2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2)) -> (forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rle x1 y1 <-> rle x2 y2) ->...-> OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt
ZifyClasses.mkuprop : forall Op : Prop -> Prop, (forall p1 q1 : Prop, p1 <-> q1 -> Op p1 <-> Op q1) -> ZifyClasses.PropUOp Op
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2
Ring_polynom.Peq : forall C : Type, (C -> C -> bool) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> bool
RingMicromega.eq0_cnf : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x : R, (rlt rO x -> False) /\ (rlt rO (ropp x) -> False) < -> req x rO
Refl.make_impl : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop -> Prop
OrderedRing.SORlt_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rlt x1 y1 < -> rlt x2 y2

``` 
intros.
intros HX HY.
apply dec2bool in HX.
apply dec2bool in HY.
rewrite HX, HY.
destruct (Dec (X <-> Y)). 
* apply Dec_true in e. exact e.
* apply Dec_false in e. exact e. 
```

original: intros. intros HX HY. apply dec2bool in HX. apply dec2bool in HY. rewrite HX, HY. destruct (Dec (X <-> Y)). * apply Dec_true in e. apply e. * apply Dec_false in e. apply e.
